name: Brighthouse Financial, Inc.
description: Brighthouse Financial, Inc. is a leading provider of annuities and life insurance products in the United States. Established in 2017 as a spin-off from MetLife, Brighthouse aims to help individuals achieve financial security and peace of mind by offering a range of innovative insurance solutions. The company's product portfolio includes fixed and variable annuities, life insurance policies, and other related financial products designed to address the needs of consumers at different life stages. With a strong emphasis on customer service and accessibility, Brighthouse leverages advanced technology and data analytics to enhance the client experience. The company is committed to delivering value to its policyholders through transparent pricing and robust financial management. As part of its long-term strategy, Brighthouse is focused on building strong partnerships with financial advisors and providing them with the tools necessary to help their clients make informed financial decisions. With a mission to empower Americans to achieve financial independence, Brighthouse Financial stands as a trusted partner in the financial services industry.
